casebody.data:
Tuesday, May 1, 2001

MOTION DOCKET

01-807. State v. Scott.

Cuyahoga App. No. 79506. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Cuyahoga County.

IT IS ORDERED BY THE COURT, sua sponte, that oral argument be set for Wednesday, May 9, 2001, at 2:30 p.m. Oral argument shall be limited to twenty minutes per side.

Douglas, Resnick and Cook, JJ., dissent.
